page.title: 1240 YEARS FARMING IN DAVIOT
page.content:
{Memories of my grandmother.
"I came to Daviot 40 years ago.Farming has changed a lot.The{tractor}was small and noisy. I liked the {horse}more than the tractor. Forty years ago you had to{milk}the cow by hand now you milk the cow by machine.It is much faster.If cows are well fed they can give a great amount of milk. The{price of cows and sheep}has changed a lot.Nowadays its about ten times as much as it was then. {Medicines}have changed and there is more medicines. Today medicines cost much more."
